Home - Lighthouse Island Resort Skip to content 239-356-7829 info@lighthouseislandresort.com 1051 Fifth St, Fort Myers Beach, Florida 239- 463-9392 Fort Myers Beach Home Stay Amenities Guest Perks Play Local Events Dine Tiki Bar Yucatan Beach Stand Exclusive Offers Gallery Contact Testimonials Accessibility Hotel Policies Employment Home Stay Amenities Guest Perks Play Local Events Dine Tiki Bar Yucatan Beach Stand Exclusive Offers Gallery Contact Testimonials Accessibility Hotel Policies Employment Home Tiki Bar Stay Stay in Paradise If you’re looking for the best hotel rates, book into our party-friendly rooms or suites. We’re mere footsteps from the heart of Fort Myers Beach. BOOK ROOM Accommodations  ⟶ Visit fun-loving Fort Myers Beach and stay where you play – at the Lighthouse Resort Inn and Suites! Amenities  ⟶ Our lush tropical grounds will make you feel like you’ve been transported to the islands. Well, you have! Located at the North end of Estero Island, our guests can walk miles of beautiful beach at sunrise or sunset. Guest Perks  ⟶ Sun, sand, service, and style are all part of the most fun experience on the edge of the Gulf of Mexico. It’s your time to enjoy yourself on the beach, how you spend it is up to you. Play There's Always Something to Do Fort Myers Beach has long been a hot spot for entertainment and activities. Throughout the year, you’ll find plenty to do. Whether you’re interested in watersports, exploring nature, or building sand castles, you’re sure to find something you love. Local Events  ⟶ Sun, sand, service, and style are all part of the most fun experience on the edge of the Gulf of Mexico. It’s your time to enjoy yourself on the beach, how you spend it is up to you. The World-Famous Tiki Bar
 ⟶ Here is where you’ll find the latest sports game playing, live music, and always a good time party! Our happy hours, drink specials, and entertainment make us a favorite of locals, regulars, and guests. Yucatan Beach Stand  ⟶ Enjoy a carefree island spirit, tasty food, live music daily, and the coldest beer on Fort Myers Beach! Savor the island breeze from our open-air indoor dining room, or dine al fresco on our outdoor patio with a unique nautical bar with swings for stools. Take a bite out of life! Dine Island Dining Lighthouse Resort has 2 wonderful dining options – providing a casual, fun & relaxed atmosphere with tasty food, drinks & entertainment. The World Famous Tiki Bar ⟶ Here is where you will find the latest sports game playing, live music, and always a good time party! Our happy hours, drink specials and entertainment make us a favorite of locals, regulars and guests. Yucatan Beach Stand  ⟶ Enjoy a carefree island spirit, tasty food, live music daily, and the coldest beer on Fort Myers Beach! Savor the island breeze from our open-air indoor dining room, or dine al fresco on our outdoor patio with a unique nautical bar with swings for stools. Take a bite out of life! DISCOUNT DETAILS SEE ALL EXCLUSIVE OFFERS Contact Contact Us Phone: 239-356-7829 info@lighthouseislandresort.com 1051 Fifth Avenue Fort Myers Beach Florida 33931 First Name Last Name Email Phone What can we help you with? Room Availability Room Types Special Offers Wedding Planners Events Message Send Policies Accessibility Testimonials Employment BOOK NOW A FUN & Family Friendly Island Resort on Fort Myers Beach Welcome to an island oasis where warmth and comfort invite you to drift away amongst the palm trees and hibiscus.  Nestled in the heart of Southwest Florida, sun and excitement meet comfort and relaxation at the Lighthouse Resort Inn & Suites. Just a short walk to Fort Myers Beach and Times Square, we offer the chance to indulge in the best food and experience all the vibrant beach vibes Estero Island has to offer. OFFSHORE COLLECTION Poolside Patio | Newly Constructed | Upscale Decor SEE ROOM OPTIONS KING COLLECTION Coastal Decor | Suited for Two | Tranquil Gardens SEE ROOM OPTIONS BOUGAINVILLEA BUNGALOW Off-Resort  | Private Parking | Canal Views SEE ROOM OPTIONS DELUXE COLLECTION Expansive Living Space | Deluxe Appointments SEE ROOM OPTIONS STUDIO COLLECTION All-in-One Concept | Room To Relax SEE ROOM OPTIONS JUNIOR COLLECTION Modern Decor | Tropical Vibes SEE ROOM OPTIONS CALLING ALL PARROTHEADS! Book a two-night stay online for October 3-5 and get a complimentary ParrotPhest wristband and free breakfast! THE NEXT GENERATION IS BRIGHT Plans are approved to proceed with renovations and construction of the new Lighthouse Island Resort. LIVE ENTERTAINMENT EVERY NIGHT There’s always something happening poolside at the Tiki Bar located in the tropical gardens of the Lighthouse resort. Welcome to Lighthouse Island Resort Visit our beautiful hotel on Fort Myers Beach and stay where you play—at The Lighthouse Resort Inn and Suites! Features include our World-Famous Lighthouse Tiki Bar and Grill—poolside in the center of the hotel—one of the most popular bars on the island for Fort Myers Beach nightlife and sunny poolside events. Join us for live entertainment nightly and the best bands on the beach. The Lighthouse Resort is located only 200′ from the Gulf of Mexico—an easy walk to the best of what the beach has to offer! Wade in the surf, rent a jet ski, fish from the shore, and enjoy spectacular sunsets over the Gulf waters. Book A Room Explore Our Rooms and Suites Visit fun-loving Fort Myers Beach and stay where you play—at the Lighthouse Resort Inn and Suites! Part of the fun is nightly live entertainment and the best bands on the beach on weekends. If you’re looking for the best hotel rates, book into our party-friendly rooms or suites. We’re mere footsteps from the heart of Fort Myers Beach. Accommodations Indulge at The Tiki Bar Our onsite, poolside World-Famous Lighthouse Tiki Bar and Grill is a very popular local place to eat and drink. It’s easy to meet new friends among the friendly regulars and happy guests. There’s even a sign that says you’re, “where good friends meet.” The Tiki Bar serves adult beverages, snacks, meals, and daily specials that you can take to your poolside lounge chair. Smokers are welcome at the Tiki Bar. Catch some of the best acts on the beach each night, live bands on weekends, and Sunday tailgate parties during football season. Join us for breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks. Bring your smartphone or tablet to use our Wi-Fi in all common areas. World Famous Tiki Bar Exerience Award Winning Dining at The Yucatan Beach Stand A world of flavor awaits you at the Yucatan Beach Stand Bar & Grill.  Located just a short walk from the resort, you’ll find a lively island-inspired open-air atmosphere featuring an extensive menu of mouthwatering seafood, sandwiches, tasty apps, and skillfully crafted cocktails. Guest can pull up a swing at the outdoor bar, choose a table on our tropical outside patio, or feel the breeze in the covered area, this beachside venue provides a memorable experience in a tropical setting. Show your server your Lighthouse room key and receive a 10% discount on your bill! HOW BOUT A LOCAL GETAWAY 15% ESCAPE DISCOUNT DETAILS SPECIAL OFFER STAY A NIGHT “4” FREE! BOOK FOUR NIGHTS DIRECT, GET YOUR FIFTH NIGHT ON US DETAILS COMPLIMENTARY GIFT WINE NOT STAY LONGER? BOOK 2  NIGHTS & RECEIVE A FREE BOTTLE OF WINE. DISCOUNT DETAILS SEE ALL EXCLUSIVE OFFERS Contact Contact Us Phone: 239-356-7829 info@lighthouseislandresort.com 1051 Fifth Avenue Fort Myers Beach Florida 33931 First Name Last Name Email Phone What can we help you with? Room Availability Room Types Special Offers Wedding Planners Events Message Send Policies Accessibility Testimonials Employment BOOK NOW Hotel Policies HOTEL POLICIES Check-In & Check-Out Check-In: After 4:00 PM Check-Out: Before 11:00 AM Late Check-Out: May be available until 6:00 PM for a fee (50% of room rate), subject to availability. Early Departures: Subject to a $25.00 cancellation fee. Guest Requirements Must be 23 years or older to register. Children under 17 stay free with a paying adult. Extra persons are charged $15.00 each per night. Room Information All rooms are non-smoking – this includes cigarettes, cigars, vaping, and marijuana. A $250.00 cleaning fee will be charged if any evidence of smoking is found in the room. Marijuana use is strictly prohibited anywhere on hotel property, regardless of state law. Wheelchair accessible rooms are available – please call to reserve. Parking One free self-parking space per room. Additional paid parking is available adjacent to the hotel. Pet & Service Animal Policy – Service Animals (as defined by the ADA) Welcome without fees or deposits. Must be housebroken and under control at all times. Guest is responsible for any damages caused. Pet & Service Animal Policy – Pets (Non-Service Animals) Must be declared in advance – pet-friendly rooms are limited. Fees: – $50/day pet fee – $100 non-refundable cleaning fee per stay – $150 refundable deposit (returned after room inspection) Must be: – Fully house-trained – On a leash or in a carrier in public areas – Not left unattended in rooms Disturbances or damage may result in removal or additional charges. $500 deep cleaning fee applies if pets are found in non-pet rooms. Additional Pet Guidelines Small pets 15 lbs or less are welcome with a $25/day fee per pet. Pets must be leashed at all times and crated if left unattended in the room. Housekeeping will not service rooms if a pet is left inside alone. Excessive noise or disturbances may lead to a request to remove the pet or vacate the hotel. WEBSITE POLICIES We Care About You And Your Privacy The Lighthouse Resort Inn & Suites values your privacy and works to earn your confidence when making reservations on this site. We have security measures in place to protect against the loss, misuse, or alteration of the information you provide on this site. We will not give or sell your personal information (such as name, address, email address, and telephone number) to any person or outside company for any use. It will be kept confidential and used only to support your customer relationship with us. Discover Paradise Book Your Stay Visit our beautiful hotel on Fort Myers Beach and stay where you play – at The Lighthouse Resort Inn and Suites! Book A Room Sign up.  See what’s new.  Receive Special Offers. Call 239-356-7829 Email info@lighthouseislandresort.com Visit 1051 Fifth Avenue, Fort Myers Beach, Florida 33931

Privacy Terms & Conditions Terms of Use Overview Spaces Nearby Hotels Lighthouse Tiki Bar & Grill Bar / Club 1051 Fifth St, Fort Myers Beach, FL 33931, United States Lighthouse Tiki Bar & Grill 1051 Fifth St, Fort Myers Beach, FL 33931, United States Request Pricing # of Spaces 1 Space Capacity Max Standing: 100 Lively Polynesian-themed bar & restaurant offering pub grub, fruity cocktails & live entertainment. Known by locals and visitors alike as Fort Myers Beach’s most legendary watering hole, the fun never ends under the thatched roof of the Tiki Bar located directly next to the main pool. Join us for scheduled live musical events, football tailgates, and the best drink specials on the beach plus friendly service and a funky vibe that all culminate in a vacation destination you’ll remember for a lifetime.

Our onsite, poolside Lighthouse Tiki Bar and Grill is a very popular local place to eat and drink. It’s easy to meet new friends among the friendly regulars and happy guests. There’s even a sign that says you’re, “where good friends meet.” The Tiki Bar serves adult beverages, snacks, meals and daily specials that you can take to your poolside lounge chair. Smokers are welcome at the Tiki Bar.

Catch some of the best acts on the beach each night, live bands on weekends and Sunday tailgate parties during football season. Join us for breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks; Bring your smartphone or tablet to use our Wi-Fi in all common areas. Offering fully customizable event packages the world famous Tiki Bar is the perfect location for an island event that is truly unforgettable. Celebrate your next big event with us! Room Availability Room Types Special Offers Wedding Planners Events Message Send Policies Accessibility Testimonials Employment BOOK NOW Step back and time and enjoy one of Fort Myers Beach’s top attractions, Mound House. The cultural and environmental landmark. Located just two miles from your Fort Myers Beach accommodations at Lighthouse Island Resort, visit the historic site, first inhabited by the Calusa tribe over two thousand years ago. At the time, the native Calusa’s dominated much of South Florida and were known sea men and sailors. Also, as skilled engineers, they created water courts with terraced mounds to protect their settlements from rising tides and natural disasters such as hurricanes. One of these structures is located right here on Fort Myers Beach and is located where the historic home and property of Mound House rests. The Mound House site houses a historic residence dating back to 1898, making it the oldest remaining structure on Fort Myers Beach. Once used as a private residence, then a post office, an R&R facility for the military during World War II, and a community center, the building was purchased by the Town of Fort Myers Beach in 1995 to save the structure from development. In the 1950s, the owners of the home began construction on an in-ground swimming pool revealed that the property was built on top of what was soon discovered to be an ancient Calusa Shell mound. The pool was transformed into a unique “underground museum” that allows visitors to get up close and personal with the layers of history resting under their feet. Along with the shell mound exhibit, ancient artifacts and a museum are available for all guests who would like to delve deep into the history of the Calusa Indians on Fort Myers Beach. The Mound House offers two tours available every Tuesday, Wednesday, and Saturday. Covid-19 Information Mound House is open from 9 am to 4 pm on Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday. Kayak tours are available. Beach walks are offered at Newton Beach Park every Tuesday and Thursday at 9 am. Masks are required for all program participants and museum visitors. CDC guidelines and social distancing apply. Mound House Museum & Store Hours Mound House Museum and Store now open Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturdays 9 a.m to 4 p.m. Appointments to visit the store can be made outside of normal business hours by calling Misty Alexander at 239-339-7726. For more information, visit www.moundhouse.org or call (239) 765-0865. Let's Connect With over 4 Decades of Hotel Operations Experience , Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC Provides Hands-on Leadership At Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC, we have a rich history of transforming properties into successful hospitality ventures. Our team is dedicated to creating exceptional experiences for guests, and our passion for hospitality drives everything we do. We take pride in our ability to elevate properties to their fullest potential, setting new standards of excellence in the industry. MEET OUR TEAM ANDREW ANDERSON  |  Co-Owner/President of Operations 30+ years of hotel experience in Property, Dual-Property, and Above Property Management ​ Hotel Experience in the Following States : Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa, Nebraska, North Dakota, Colorado, Washington, Minnesota Experience with the Following Brands : Fairfield Inn, Fairfield Inn & Suites, Residence Inn by Marriott, Courtyard by Marriott, TownPlace Suites, Comfort Inn, Comfort Suites, Sleep Inn, Sleep Inn & Suites, MainStay Suites, Choice Ascend Collection, AmericInn by Wyndham, Cobblestone Hotel, Cobblestone Hotel & Suites, Boarders by Cobblestone, and Hampton Inn. Adjunct Facilitator at Fox Valley Technical College – Room Operations & Group Sales. Certified ServiceTrainer for Residence Inn by Marriott. Lead General Manager for Extended Stay Division. Performed Regional Manager/Area Director for over 24 hotels throughout Midwest. Achievements : General Manager for Service Award-Winning Hotels for 10 years. PATTI ANDERSON  |  Co-Owner/Administrator Over three decades of dedication and expertise to the hospitality industry Beginning her career as a Front Desk Supervisor, Patti developed a deep understanding of guest services and operational excellence from the ground up. Over the past 15 years, she has honed her leadership skills as a General Manager, where she has been instrumental in driving team success, enhancing guest experiences, and achieving operational and financial goals. Known for her hands-on leadership style, Patti is passionate about empowering teams to exceed expectations and create memorable guest experiences. Her strategic approach to property management, combined with her ability to cultivate meaningful relationships with both staff and guests, has contributed to the success of numerous properties under her management. When she’s not focused on hospitality operations, Patti is dedicated to personal and professional growth. She constantly explores innovative strategies to stay ahead in the everevolving industry. As co-owner of Lighthouse Hospitality Group, she is committed to building strong partnerships and delivering exceptional results for every property under her care. Patti’s journey is a testament to hard work, lifelong learning, and a commitment to excellence. Whether leading a team, strategizing for growth, or ensuring every guest feels at home, Patti embodies the essence of hospitality. FAMILY VALUES Andrew and Patti have been happily married for 20 years and are proud co-owners of Lighthouse Hospitality Group, LLC. Together, they reside in Oshkosh, WI, where they enjoy raising their three children. Balancing family life with business ownership, Andrew and Patti are deeply committed to their family and the success of their growing management company. Their shared vision and dedication drive them forward as they navigate life and business together.
